alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 8:58PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflow winds will impact portions of Ellis County through 930 PM CDT... At 857 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm near Waxahachie, moving east at 35 mph. Strong outflow winds are spreading out from this decaying storm. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Grand Prairie, Mansfield, Cedar Hill, Lancaster, Waxahachie, Ennis, Midlothian, Glenn Heights, Red Oak, Ovilla, Venus, Ferris, Palmer, Italy, Oak Leaf, Maypearl, Bardwell, Alma, Bardwell Lake and Garrett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and north central Texas.
